overview: Early classics from director Matt Sterling. Collection of three short films from Falcon Studios and Dimension Films. "The Brothers" — The original brothers-doing-it-together film with all-American Dean Chasson getting sex lessons from more experienced Greg. "Big, Hot & Horny" (a.k.a. "Reamin' and Creamin'") — Bert Edwards's sexual passion is obviously both physical and mental as he aggressively forces himself onto and into his partner both anally and orally. "The Way You Love" — Rick is a young sensitive boy with a physical desire that he doesn't quite fully understand. Now he finds himself alone with Jimmy and the excitement causes his heart to pound and his body to tremble in anticipation.
title: The Brothers
